price: 192. Usun koroosannuu kee sin Qidimik yexxeereeniih yuslumeenik, Toysa Diggah Yalli dambi cabti-li xuwaw-li kinni.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
